title: Uncle Tom's Cabin - account of Kentuckian behavior

content.question: The narrator accounts for the behavior of present-day Kentuckians by

choices.label: evoking philosophical doctrines of free will
referencing fate and the power of the stars
claiming that it has been inherited
acknowledging the complex influences that caused it

content.answer: claiming that it has been inherited

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
